metadata.title: CVE-2021-33178 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The Manage Backgrounds functionality within Nagvis versions prior to 2.0.9 is vulnerable to an authenticated path traversal vulnerability. Exploitation of this results in a malicious actor having the ability to arbitrarily delete files on the local system.

criterions.comment: nagvis package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
